structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-241.2. Passenger transportation service.
Effective October 1, 2001, every person engaged in the following businesses shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes,: Taxicab Passenger Service Company, Non Emergency Medical Transportation, Passenger Motor Carrier, Special Transportation Service, Limousine Service, and/or any other passenger transportation service regulated by the Miami-Dade County Consumer Services Department. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no local business tax receipt license shall be required from a holder of a For-Hire Taxicab License.
